welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cadiz, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this enchanting city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jerez De La Frontera Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Jerez De La Frontera Airport, mainly used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
